title: Julien Darui
text:
Julien Darui (16 February 1916 – 13 December 1987) was a French <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>, who had stints as a coach after his playing career.
International career.
Darui was born in <a href="Luxembourg">Luxembourg</a> during World War I, to parents of Portuguese and Italian descent, and emigrated to France at a young age. Darui was capped 25 times for <a href="France%20national%20football%20team">France</a>. In 1999, he was elected best French goalkeeper of the century by <a href="L%27%C3%89quipe">L'Équipe</a>.
Honours.
Player.
<a href="CO%20Roubaix-Tourcoing">CO Roubaix-Tourcoing</a>
<a href="Red%20Star%20Olympique">Red Star Olympique</a>
